property.name: name
property.description: The name of an entity (e.g., user, category, product, role).

property.name: isExclusive
property.description: A flag indicating if a discount is exclusive.

property.name: position
property.description: The position or order of an item in a list.

property.name: frontEndReference
property.description: A reference used on the front end, often for product labels.

property.name: detail
property.description: A detailed error message providing more specific information about an issue.

property.name: name
property.description: The name of an entity (e.g., user, category, product, role).
